sources.title: Trouble at Melody Mesa (1949) COWBOY WESTERN
sources.description:
Stars: Brad King, Cal Shrum, Walt Shrum
Director: W. Merle Connell

When his father dies of suspicious circumstances and an uncle plots to take over the family ranch, the son turns to the town Marshal for help.

metadata.Plot: Jimmy's father, a rancher, died in suspicious circumstances. To make things worse, Jimmy's disreputable uncle has a plot to take over the ranch. Jimmy turns to his friend Brad, the Marshal, for help.
metadata.Actors: Brad King, Cal Shrum, Walt Shrum
